books.author: by Jonathan Safran Foer
books.description: A 9-year-old boy searches New York City for the lock that fits a key belonging to his father, who died on Sept. 11.
books.name: EXTREMELY LOUD AND INCREDIBLY CLOSE

books.author: by Robert Crais
books.description: It’s Joe Pike to the rescue when Elvis Cole is seized by human traffickers.
books.name: TAKEN

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the 40-year-old disappearance of a Swedish heiress.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: Stephanie Plum, a Jersey girl with Spandex bike shorts and turquoise eye shadow, enters the business of crime-busting when she’s laid off from her job as a lingerie buyer; first published in 1994.
books.name: ONE FOR THE MONEY

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: Jack Morgan, the head of an investigative firm, is accused of murder.
books.name: PRIVATE: #1 SUSPECT

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: In Volume 2 of the Millennium trilogy, a Swedish hacker becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO PLAYED WITH FIRE

books.author: by Lara Adrian
books.description: A group of Breed warriors called the Order battle against the malevolent vampire Dragos.
books.name: DARKER AFTER MIDNIGHT

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: Volume 3 of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment is to stop Lee Harvey Oswald.

books.author: by Sabrina Jeffries
books.description: When the youngest Sharpe sister hatches a plan to gain marriage offers, a strait-laced Bow Street Runner vows to ruin her scheme.
books.name: A LADY NEVER SURRENDERS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Partners in a small law firm take on a big case after a fast-track burnout joins them.
books.name: THE LITIGATORS

books.author: by George Pelecanos
books.description: In the summer of 1972, Derek Strange has left the Washington police force and hung out his shingle as a detective.
books.name: WHAT IT WAS

books.author: by Darcie Chan
books.description: Only one man knows an abused widow, which revealed will change many lives in her small Vermont town.
books.name: THE MILL RIVER RECLUSE

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents die in a car accident, a young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS
